article_title: Is Japan's Economy Recovering? Godzilla Won't Let It

article_metadata.description: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe (Photo credit: Wikipedia) This story appears in the October 7, 2013 issue of Forbes. In the 1950s Japan created a genre of monster movies, exemplified by Godzilla. One has to wonder whether these creatures, science-fiction-like, made themselves look human back in the 1980s and took over Japan's finance [...]
